segments.text: Hi , can I speak with the apartment manager , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , this is the apartment manager speaking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm calling about the apartment for rent on Main Street .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you be interested in seeing the apartment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would love to see it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you free today at around 6 p . m . ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I will be able to make it then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'll see you at 6 p . m . Do you know how to get there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I used to live in that area .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll give you an application form when I see you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds good . Do I need to bring anything ?
segments.speaker: S1
